name: tvify
description: Una web app para seleccionar tus shows favoritos

scripts.build-js: NODE_PATH=. browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/client/index.js > public/app.js
scripts.copy-files: cp src/client/index.css public/app.css && cp src/client/index.html public/index.html
scripts.build: npm run public && npm run build-js && npm run copy-files
